statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT id, energy_usage, timestamp, tariff_rate FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT id FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE tariff_rate < 0.05 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE timestamp >= '2023-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, energy_usage, tariff_rate FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY energy_usage DESC
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_usage * tariff_rate AS cost FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY cost ASC
SELECT SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage, AVG(tariff_rate) AS average_tariff_rate FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE timestamp < '2022-11-01' GROUP BY timestamp
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_usage, tariff_rate FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT timestamp, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT timestamp, energy_consumed, cost FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY energy_consumed ASC;
SELECT SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT energy_consumed, cost FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 1000;
SELECT timestamp, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE cost < 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN tariff_rates ON energy_consumption_data.timestamp = tariff_rates.time_of_day;
SELECT SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed, AVG(cost) AS avg_cost FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT id, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT date, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM TariffRates WHERE rate > 0;
SELECT saving_amount FROM CostSavings WHERE saving_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_consumed > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, date, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE device_id = 5 ORDER BY energy_consumed ASC;
SELECT date, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY date HAVING total_energy > 5000 ORDER BY total_energy DESC;
SELECT d.id, d.date, t.rate FROM EnergyConsumptionData d INNER JOIN TariffRates t ON d.device_id = t.tariff_id WHERE t.rate < 0.10 ORDER BY d.date ASC;

SELECT c.saving_id, c.saving_amount, e.energy_consumed, t.rate FROM CostSavings c JOIN EnergyConsumptionData e ON c.energy_consumption_id = e.id JOIN TariffRates t ON c.tariff_id = t.tariff_id WHERE e.energy_consumed > 2000 AND t.rate > 0.15 ORDER BY t.rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT timestamp, device_id, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM CostSavings WHERE energy_saved > 100;
SELECT device_id, energy_consumed, rate FROM EnergyComparison ORDER BY energy_consumed ASC, rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, energy_consumed FROM EnergyComparison WHERE tariff_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT MAX(energy_consumed) AS max_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT CostSavings.timestamp, cost_savings, rate FROM CostSavings JOIN EnergyComparison ON CostSavings.device_id = EnergyComparison.device_id WHERE energy_saved > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT device_name FROM devices WHERE id = 2;
SELECT analysis_date, total_cost FROM analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT tariff_name, rate FROM tariff_rates WHERE rate > 0;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 100
SELECT device_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY device_id
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT device_name, analysis_date, total_cost FROM devices JOIN analysis ON devices.id = analysis.id ORDER BY total_cost DESC, analysis_date
SELECT tariff_name, rate FROM tariff_rates WHERE rate < 0.1 ORDER BY rate ASC
